On December 21, John Schwarzwalder wrote that he was disturbed by the section
of the minutes on the Wilmington situation and did not feel that they correctly
reflect Mr. Marks * views on what was said.
Mr. Marks replied that he would not request the minutes be rewritten but would,
ask that his position (as.stated above) be added as a part of the record.
Schwarswalder replied that this answer was satisfactory but that the minutes
still needed clarification.
